snippet: A lawyer for Richard Kobak, a stuntman who played Spider-Man in some flying sequences, has gone to court asking the show's producers for documents.
abstract: A lawyer for Richard Kobak, a stuntman who played Spider-Man in some flying sequences, has gone to court asking the show's producers for documents.

headline.main: 'Spider-Man' Stuntman, Citing Injuries, Starts Legal Action
